description:
Hike with pride and bring the colour. With its mesh zones, dialed fit and seamless toe, these Hike Light Cushion Pride socks will have you looking for peaks to bag.

  • Merino wool and nylon blend wicks sweat and manages temperature
  • 4 Degree™ Elite Fit System combines two elastics for a performance fit
  • Indestructawool™ blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Shred Shield™ technology makes the socks last longer and feel better
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe to keep your toes comfy while you’re hiking the peaks
  • Mesh vent zones let your feet breath
  • Comfort welt for a secure fit
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Pride Pattern Crew Socks - Unisex
